title: York Cathedral
brief_description: A study of York Minister, famous for its XIV century west front, its solemn and impressive nave, lofty choir, and beautiful reredos. Includes views of transepts, Lady Chapel, High Alter, ancient stained glass windows, sculptures, and the relics of the crypt.
